data_dictionary_text: A unique identifier for this case, in the form of a mongoDB object identifier (24 characters 0-9a-f).

Status of a case. Cases which are discarded were previously suspected but have now been confirmed negative, and should be excluded from case counts. Cases which are omit_error were incorrectly added and should be dismissed from any data interpretation.
Whether the infection occured in an endemic, or non-endemic region.
The location associated with this case.
Age of the individual, specified as a range, either open-ended (<n, >n) or as a range delimited by a hyphen following 5-year age increments (m-n)
Sex at birth of an individual.
The date on which the case was confirmed. There will also be a confirmation event but the date is stored denormalised for efficiency.
Information about the source and status of this case.
If this case is excluded from the line list, information about when and why it was excluded.
